page.title: 18TYPICAL FAMILY-continued
page.content: HELPS IN THE GARDEN.WE ALL WEED THE GARDEN INCLUDING MY SISTER AND I.WE HAVE A BARN WHICH WE HAVE CONVERTED INTO A PLACE WHERE WE CAN PLAY TABLE RENNIS AND SNOOKER.WE STORE MANY THINGS. OUR HOUSE HAS FOUR BEDROOMS.IT ALSO HAS TWO TOILETS.WE HAVE RE-DECORATED EVERY ROOM IN THE HOUSE. MY MUM WORKS IN A HOSPITAL EVERY THURSDAY.SHE WORKS ALOT IN OUR GARDEN. OUR PET IS A CHINCHILLA BREED OF RABBIT CALLED PETER.HE IS VERY FRIENDLY. MY HOBBIES ARE STAMP COLLECTING, COIN COLLECTING AND MAKING MODEL AIRPLANES. MY SISTER LIKES MAKING THINGS FROM FELT. WE HAVE BEEN ON MANY HOLIDAYS TOGETHER TO:YORKSHIRE,THE ISLE OF MAN,MAJORCA AND TENERIFE.WE HAVE BEEN
